checks.name: Automated Incident Detection and Reporting Integration

testResults.test: SIEM integration and automated detection effectiveness
testResults.details: 247 detection rules with 3.2% false positive rate and advanced correlation capabilities

checks.name: Incomplete Customer and Stakeholder Notification
checks.description: Customer and stakeholder notification processes lack automation and consistent execution for incident communication

testResults.test: Customer notification timeliness and automation assessment
testResults.details: Notification targets exceeded by 123% for critical incidents with limited automation
Manual processes for external stakeholders with ad-hoc vendor notification
Basic email tracking with no response tracking or effectiveness measurement

checks.remediation: MEDIUM PRIORITY: 1) Implement automated customer notification with impact assessment and customized content delivery, 2) Establish comprehensive stakeholder notification automation for internal, external, and regulatory requirements, 3) Develop advanced communication templates with technical detail customization and business impact communication, 4) Create multi-channel communication capabilities with backup channels and accessibility support, 5) Deploy notification tracking and validation with delivery confirmation and effectiveness metrics, 6) Implement communication feedback collection and continuous improvement processes

checks.name: Insufficient Incident Reporting Analytics and Metrics
checks.description: Incident reporting lacks comprehensive analytics and metrics for performance measurement and continuous improvement

testResults.test: Incident reporting metrics and analytics capability assessment
testResults.details: Basic metrics implementation with no systematic quality or accuracy measurement
Basic executive dashboards with no compliance visualization or stakeholder-specific reporting

testResults.test: Continuous improvement integration and maturity tracking
testResults.details: Manual improvement processes with no systematic optimization tracking or maturity assessment

checks.remediation: MEDIUM PRIORITY: 1) Establish comprehensive reporting performance metrics with timeliness, quality, completeness, and accuracy measurement, 2) Implement automated compliance metrics tracking for FedRAMP and regulatory requirements with audit readiness indicators, 3) Deploy advanced analytics capabilities with trend analysis, root cause analysis automation, and efficiency measurement, 4) Create comprehensive dashboards for executive, operational, and compliance stakeholders with real-time visualization, 5) Establish benchmarking and comparison capabilities with industry standards and historical performance, 6) Integrate continuous improvement tracking with optimization recommendations and maturity assessment
